text: Zisas vov Fhe Bakɨme phena bɨna vhen vergap, Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuin gumgi gu mbigi khɨvav mbe nzuai. Ana mbe nzuaim, mba Fhe Bakɨmen rotu gari gumgir pani gum Zudaiŋ gumgir pani ana han zav kha nzambara ana muuŋgi. Mbe khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu maaŋ mba zɨ bakɨme gu ŋkasŋka ndigap kha bigi ga mbui? The mba zɨ bakɨmen ndu nɨɨŋgiap, mba ŋaarar muun za ndu suaŋgim, ndu mba ŋaara mbui?”
